stripped_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Veritas
